item.title: Docker image - commands
item.description: Docker has got couple commands that allows us to manage images. List images Usage of docker image ls is described in another post: Docker image - list Remove images Let’s check what images we have locally: [lukas@docker-host ~]## docker image ls REPOSITORY TAG IMAGE ID CREATED SIZE postgres latest 9907cacf0c01 8 days ago 314MB alpine latest a187dde48cd2 2 weeks ago 5.6MB ubuntu 18.04 4e5021d210f6 2 weeks ago 64.2MB ubuntu latest 4e5021d210f6 2 weeks ago 64.
